title: [BUG REPORT] Thunderlords Bug
body:
Thunderlords is going off on Elise without having to damage someone 3 times.

shown here, i was on low HP (but had been for a while, i hadn't just come out of a fight)
and she just jumps out of the bushes, and hits me with 1 ability and thunderlords goes off....

happened multiple times....

as if it wasn't broken enough already...

replies.body: Maybe her spiderlings set it off? I think Zyras plants set off the thunderlords proc.
Nah I don't think so, If they hit me they would show up on the death recap
Did she recently hit spells on an enemy, it still goes off if she hits and enemy with 2 spells then hits you with one it will still proc.
No I'm pretty sure she wasn't in a fight before hand
